title: Ghost of Tsushima Legends is Going Standalone - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.04.21
description:
Imran Khan RETURNS and joins Blessing to talk about Ghost of Tsushima Legends, Gamescom Opening Night Live, PS5 aiming to sell way more units, and more!

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:29 - Housekeeping
A new Gamescast is up right now featuring special guest, Danny Pena from Gamertag Radio! We talk about our most hype game launches of all time along with Tim and Andy giving their Halo Infinite Test Flight impressions. That’s up right now on youtube and podcast services around the globe.
Patreon Platinum Tier: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids/status/1422237455630036992
TONIGHT, Snowbike Mike and Barrett Courtney are doing an anime movie watch night. That’s going down at 7:30pm pt and they’re watching a movie called Summer Wars with you the audience. That’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
Last but not least, The Blessing Show is BACK with a special event. It’s a 20 minute episode about Returnal, Hades, and the increasing popularity of Roguelites. That is going live as a Youtube Premiere tomorrow (Thursday) at 9:30am so you can come through, chat as it's going live, and have a good time. That will also be up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
The Roper Report  -
00:08:50 - We finally have details on the new Ghost of Tsushima LEGENDS content coming alongside the Director’s Cut - Darren Bridges @ PS Blog
00:23:36 - Gamescom 2021 Opening Night Live is gonna be TWO hours - Ali Jones @ GamesRadar
00:29:05 - Do you expect to see any Game Awards level big banger announcements? - Best Friends Q:ComradeBleu
00:35:00 - Sony wants to sell 22 million PS5s by March - Andy Robinson @ VGC
A couple of Activision Blizzard updates
00:49:04 - Blizzard's head of HR is gone as well - Steven Messner @ PC Gamer
00:47:00 - Ad
00:57:35 -Let’s talk about Street Fighter
01:04:35 - Out today
01:06:40 - Squad Up:Josh(PC or PlayStation)
01:07:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:TimTam
